dashboards_data.name: CNAPP - Posture Issues Detail
dashboards_data.description: Combined view of CNAPP posture issues with detailed breakdowns by severity, status, category, and asset context

data.phrase:
dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.provider
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"| comp count() as TOTAL by xdm.asset.provider
| fields xdm.asset.provider, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL


| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.asset.provider yaxis = TOTAL

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"| comp count() as TOTAL by xdm.issue.category
| fields xdm.issue.category, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL


| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.issue.category yaxis = TOTAL

| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.cloud.region
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)

| fields xdm.asset.cloud.region, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL


| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.asset.cloud.region yaxis = TOTAL

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.realm
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"
| alter realm = if(xdm.asset.realm ~= "^[0-9]+$", concat("\"", to_string(xdm.asset.realm), "\""), to_string(xdm.asset.realm))
| comp count() as TOTAL by realm
| fields realm, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL



| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = realm yaxis = TOTAL

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"| comp count() as TOTAL by xdm.issue.name
| sort desc TOTAL
| limit 15



| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal xaxis = xdm.issue.name yaxis = TOTAL seriescolor("TOTAL","#ec7c7c")

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.provider, xdm.asset.realm, xdm.asset.cloud.region, xdm.asset.name, xdm.asset.type.category, xdm.asset.type.name, xdm.asset.strong_id
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0
| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"
| fields
    xdm.issue.id,
    case_id,
    _insert_time,
    xdm.issue.name,
    xdm.issue.severity,
    xdm.issue.status.progress,
    xdm.issue.category,
    xdm.issue.type,
    xdm.issue.owner,
    xdm.issue.platform_severity,
    xdm.issue.observation_time,
    xdm.asset.name as asset_name,
    xdm.asset.provider,
    xdm.asset.realm,
    xdm.asset.cloud.region,
    xdm.asset.type.category,
    xdm.asset.type.name,
    xdm.asset.strong_id,
    xdm.issue.description
| sort desc xdm.issue.id

input_dict.xql:
dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.provider
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| fields xdm.asset.provider as provider
| dedup provider

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.realm
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| fields xdm.asset.realm as realm
| dedup realm
| alter realm = if(realm ~= "^[0-9]+$", concat("\"", to_string(realm), "\""), to_string(realm))
| fields realm

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.cloud.region
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| fields xdm.asset.cloud.region as region
| dedup region

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.type.category
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| fields xdm.asset.type.category as type_category
| dedup type_category

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.type.class
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| fields xdm.asset.type.class as type_class
| dedup type_class

params.name: type_name
params.title: Asset Type Name
valueOptions: Google Cloud IAM Service Account Key
Amazon API Gateway REST API Stage

input_dict.xql:
dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.type.name
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| fields xdm.asset.type.name as type_name
| dedup type_name

dataset = issues
| fields xdm.issue.severity as issue_severity
| dedup issue_severity

dataset = issues
| fields xdm.issue.status.progress as issue_status
| dedup issue_status

dataset = issues
| filter xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"
| fields xdm.issue.category as issue_category
| dedup issue_category

dataset = issues
| filter xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"
| fields xdm.issue.name as issue_name
| dedup issue_name

widgets_data.title: Issues per Provider
widgets_data.description: Distribution of correlated issues by asset provider

data.phrase:
dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.provider
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"| comp count() as TOTAL by xdm.asset.provider
| fields xdm.asset.provider, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL


| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.asset.provider yaxis = TOTAL

widgets_data.title: Issues by Asset Type Name
widgets_data.description: Counts grouped by asset type name

widgets_data.title: Issue Details with Asset Context
widgets_data.description: Detailed issue list enriched with asset inventory fields.

data.phrase:
dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.provider, xdm.asset.realm, xdm.asset.cloud.region, xdm.asset.name, xdm.asset.type.category, xdm.asset.type.name, xdm.asset.strong_id
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0
| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"
| fields
    xdm.issue.id,
    case_id,
    _insert_time,
    xdm.issue.name,
    xdm.issue.severity,
    xdm.issue.status.progress,
    xdm.issue.category,
    xdm.issue.type,
    xdm.issue.owner,
    xdm.issue.platform_severity,
    xdm.issue.observation_time,
    xdm.asset.name as asset_name,
    xdm.asset.provider,
    xdm.asset.realm,
    xdm.asset.cloud.region,
    xdm.asset.type.category,
    xdm.asset.type.name,
    xdm.asset.strong_id,
    xdm.issue.description
| sort desc xdm.issue.id

widgets_data.title: Issues by Cloud Account
widgets_data.description: Distribution of correlated issues by cloud account/realm

data.phrase:
dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id, xdm.asset.realm
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"
| alter realm = if(xdm.asset.realm ~= "^[0-9]+$", concat("\"", to_string(xdm.asset.realm), "\""), to_string(xdm.asset.realm))
| comp count() as TOTAL by realm
| fields realm, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL



| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = realm yaxis = TOTAL

dataset = issues
| arrayexpand xdm.issue.asset_ids
| join (
    dataset = asset_inventory
    | filter xdm.asset.provider IN ($provider)
    | filter xdm.asset.realm IN ($realm)
    | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region IN ($region)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.category IN ($type_category)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.class IN ($type_class)
    | filter xdm.asset.type.name IN ($type_name)
    | fields xdm.asset.id
) as inventory inventory.xdm.asset.id = xdm.issue.asset_ids

| join type = left (
    dataset = case_to_issue 
    | fields xdm.case.id as case_id, xdm.issue.id as issue_id
) as cases xdm.issue.id = cases.issue_id 
| filter ($linked_to_case != "YES") or case_id >= 0

| filter xdm.issue.name IN ($issue_name)
| filter xdm.issue.severity IN ($issue_severity)
| filter xdm.issue.status.progress IN ($issue_status)
| filter xdm.issue.category in ($issue_category)
| filter ($exclude_vulnerability != "YES") or xdm.issue.category != "VULNERABILITY"| comp count() as TOTAL by xdm.issue.status.progress
| fields xdm.issue.status.progress, TOTAL
| sort desc TOTAL


| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.issue.status.progress yaxis = TOTAL
